inputEvents.name: SensorReading
inputEvents.filterExpression: (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_1 >= 485 || SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_2 >= 485 || SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_3 >= 485 || SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_4 >= 485 || SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_5 >= 485 || SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_6 >= 485 || SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_7 >= 485 ||SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_8 >= 485 ||SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_9 >= 485) && SensorReading.average_exhst_gas_temp > 250

expressions.cylinderNumber: if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_1 >= 485) then (1) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_2 >= 485) then (2) else (if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_3 >= 485) then (3) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_4 >= 485) then (4) else (if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_5 >= 485) then (5) else (if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_6 >= 485) then (6) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_7 >= 485) then (7) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_8 >= 485) then (8) else (9) endif ) endif ) endif  ) endif  ) endif ) endif  ) endif) endif
expressions.exhaustGasTemperature: if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_1 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_1) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_2 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_2) else (if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_3 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_3) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_4 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_4) else (if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_5 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_5) else (if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_6 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_6) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_7 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_7) else ( if (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_8 >= 485) then (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_8) else (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_9) endif ) endif ) endif  ) endif  ) endif ) endif  ) endif) endif

inputEvents.name: SensorReading
inputEvents.filterExpression: SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_1 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_2 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_3 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_4 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_5 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_6 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_7 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_8 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_9 < 480

inputEvents.name: SensorReading
inputEvents.filterExpression: (Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_1) >= 35 || Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_2) >= 35 || Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_3) >= 35 || Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_4) >= 35 || Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_5) >= 35 || Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_6) >= 35 || Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_7) >= 35 ||Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_8) >= 35 ||Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_9) >= 35) && SensorReading.average_exhst_gas_temp > 250

inputEvents.name: SensorReading
inputEvents.filterExpression: Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_1) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_2) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_3) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_4) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_5) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_6) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_7) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_8)< 35 &&Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_9) < 35

terminators.name: SensorReading
terminators.condition: (Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_1) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_2) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_3) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_4) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_5) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_6) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_7) < 35 && Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_8)< 35 &&Abs(SensorReading.exhst_gat_dev_cdr_9) < 35) ||SensorReading.engine_speed < 400

terminators.name: SensorReading
terminators.condition: (SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_1 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_2 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_3 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_4 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_5 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_6 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_7 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_8 < 480 && SensorReading.exhst_gat_tmp_cdr_9 < 480) || SensorReading.engine_speed < 400
